anybody using opera here?: do u know how to make my opera play videos?
i can use firefox to view videos but not opera
you might want to try epiphany, it seems to take advantage of the installed media players that you may have installed for firefox,  but it seems lighter-weight in use. Galeon is handy as well.
It may be over kill for your needs - but I tend to have a selection of browsers at my disposal as it allows me to log into the same website under separate sessions  for testing when I'm developeing.
do u dl torrent using opera? i use deluge as my torrent client, do u know how i can cancel this option in opera? bcos opera uses bittorrent by default :(
I don't use opera for torrent downloading, I use bitswash, a stand alone torrent client
let me look at my opera prefs - I'll see whether I can find anything
yes, me too...but i can't disable it

within Opera, go to tools->preferences->Downloads,  untick the "Hide file types opened with opera" option, type torrent into the "quick find" box and you can edit or delete the handler option for torrent files
